page.title: 08TRANSPORT/SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content:
{TRANSPORT}: The{A1 trunk road}which is the main route between Edinburgh and London gives easy access to the surrounding area. A network of B class and minor roads lead to other small settlements such as Gifford. The area is served reasonably well by{public {transport.}There is also a disused minor railway line to the East of the the town.
{SOCIAL CONCERNS}: The{DHSS}caters for the unemployed, elderly, one parent families etc. The{Citizens' Advice {Bureau}gives up to date information and advice on law, tax, rents, tenancies, marriage, families, education, government, councils, jobs, doctors and benefits all free of charge. A lawyer is also available to advise on any legal matters.
